mapper.sql: name, type, purchasePrice, stock, purchaseDate, isreturn, price, salesVolume
mapper.insert: insert into thing (name, type, purchasePrice, stock, purchaseDate, isreturn, price, salesVolume) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchasedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isreturn,jdbcType=BIT}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{salesvolume,jdbcType=INTEGER})

name,
type,
purchasePrice,
stock,
purchaseDate,
isreturn,
price,
salesVolume,

mapper.update:
update thing
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchasePrice = #{purchaseprice,jdbcType=REAL},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchaseDate = #{purchasedate,jdbcType=DATE},
isreturn = #{isreturn,jdbcType=BIT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL},
salesVolume = #{salesvolume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
